article: women from around the world gathered in libya this week for the nation 's first international beauty pageant , where contestants ditched swimsuits and sequins for t-shirts and dresses adorned with pictures of libyan leader moammar gadhafi .
abstract: international beauties wear gadhafi t-shirts at libya 's first ever beauty contest
